author: The Wall Street Journal
description:
It took two people to make WSJ’s Amy Dockser Marcus feel like a woman in her 80s.⁠
⁠
At the MIT AgeLab, which works on finding ways to improve life for the elderly, researchers let her spend a day in their age-simulation suit. She hoped the experience might bring greater insight into what it’s really like to age—and how to prepare.⁠

#MIT #Aging #Shorts
title: I Wore a Suit That Made Me Feel Like I Was 80
